explains: v. 缠住，盘绕；使缠绕；与……密切相关

sentences.en: Once, years ago, he told me our lives should entwine.
sentences.cn: 多年前他曾跟我说，我们的生命应该交织在一起。

sentences.en: His dazed eyes stare at the eels, which still writhe and entwine.
sentences.cn: 他茫然地盯着那些仍在扭动缠绕的鳗鱼。

sentences.en: Facing each other, the giraffes entwine their necks in the most astonishing manner.
sentences.cn: 长颈鹿面对面地站着，以令人无比惊骇的姿势将脖子缠绕到了一起。
